mapper.select: SELECT t.user_id AS userId, t.user_name AS userName, t.passport, t.head_img_url AS headImgUrl FROM mall.mall_tb_user t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall.mall_tb_user ( USER_NAME, PASSPORT, SEX, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTRY, HEAD_IMG_URL, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{passport}, #{sex}, #{province}, #{city}, #{country}, #{headImgUrl}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
